product_name: Woolrich Kristie Plaid Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ready for all your rainy-day excursions, the waterproof, breathable Woolrich Kristie plaid rain jacket keeps you dry while remaining lightweight, comfortable and easy to pack away if the skies clear. Polyester fabric boasts a Hydromax Ultra waterproof, breathable membrane that blocks rain and wind; adjustable hood ensures complete coverage. Polyester lining feels soft against skin. Front zipper features an internal storm flap to seal in warmth; drawcord adjustable waist and hem also help retain body heat. Zippered hand pockets and chest pocket with snap closure; internal pocket with snap-closure. Th Woolrich Kristie plaid rain jacket packs down small and comes with a mesh bag for easy packing and traveling. Closeout.
short_description: Ready for all your rainy-day excursions, the waterproof, breathable Woolrich Kristie plaid rain jacket keeps you dry while remaining lightweight, comfortable and easy to pack away if the skies clear.
